name: Avoid In Traffic: Don't Smashy Cars On The Road
name_original: Avoid In Traffic: Don't Smashy Cars On The Road
description:
You are WANTED!
Avoid in traffic and don't smashy road & cars to jam!!

Take your car with Loop Drive to get new heights! Master and unlock all 90 vehicles.

Race through the desert, grasslands and the city or encounter SECRET areas with great rewards!

Escape the POLICE, the SWAT, the ARMY JEEPS and the TANKS! How long can you last?

This is a simple racing game but challenging driving/racing game where all you have to do is drive in circles, keep your car safe and avoid any crash.

Speed up and join AvoidIn Traffic but do not crash!
